pv15:11.2: taṃ hi okiriṃ → taṃ vikīrihaṃ (s2, s3, mr)
pv15:24.1: gharā tā ca dāsiyo → te gharadāsiyo āsuṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2) | te ghare dāsiyo ceva (mr)
pv15:27.1: tyāhaṃ → kiṃ tāhaṃ (bj, pts1-2) | kiṃ tyāhaṃ (s2, s3) | kiṃ vatāhaṃ (mr)
pv15:27.2: tedha → kiṃ vā ca te (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2) | kiṃ vidha te (mr)
